movies.title: Dangal
movies.actors: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh
movies.plot: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

movies.title: Runway 34
movies.actors: Ajay Devgn, Amitabh Bachchan, Rakul Preet Singh
movies.plot: Inspired by true incidents, "Runway 34" revolves around Captain Vikrant Khanna played by Ajay Devgn, a flying prodigy, whose flight takes a mysterious course after take-off from an international destination.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movies.plot: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

movies.title: Cars 2
movies.actors: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine
movies.plot: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international e...
